page.title: 05EDUCATION 2
page.content: Beacon Comprehensive, for students aged 11_18, has two sites & is the largest secondary school in Britain. 684 pupils aged 11_13 attend Green Lane which was opened in 1983. It is very well equipped but teachers only take 1 or 2 subjects with classes of about 29.Outside activities are varied and school uniform is worn.Residential visits are made in this country and abroad.Choice of menu is served at lunch time or pupils take sandwiches. The main school site has 1356 pupils aged 13_18 and was opened in 1955 as a Secondary School becoming Comprehens_ ive in 1969.Over 30 different subjects are taught and many after_school acti_ vities are organised to further pupils education.Each class average 22 pupils but this decreases in 5th & 6th forms when pupils take external examinations Adult education is available.
